text:
@fred_guttenberg @MalcolmNance The problem is that this idiot bought millions of doses for the US natl stockpile for #coronavirus USING TAXPAYER MONEY.

His impulse buy created a natl shortage of #Hydroxychloroquine for lupus & rheumatoid arthritis patients who need the drug & take it DAILY. https://t.co/1I7ENy8OmR
